titleStmt.title: The Princess of Cleves the most famed romance / written in French by the greatest wits of France ; rendred into English by a person of quality, at the request of some friends.
Princesse de Clèves. English
titleStmt.author: La Fayette, Madame de (Marie-Madeleine Pioche de La Vergne), 1634-1693.
Segrais, Jean Regnauld de, 1624-1701.
La Rochefoucauld, François, duc de, 1613-1680.
Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: La princesse de Clèves.

Written by the Comtesse de Lafayette with the assistance of the Duc de la Rochefaucauld. Sometimes attributed to Jean Regnauld de Segrais who lent his name to the publication. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
First ed. in English. Cf. BM.
Licensed Octob. 11, 1678. Roger L'Estrange--First prelim. page.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
